tuv.seg: Find out about the penalties in place if you are convicted of a driving offence
Tá eolas anseo maidir leis na pionóis a ghearrtar má fhaightear ciontach tú i gCoir Tiomána
Drink driving is a very serious offence
Cion an-tromchúiseach is ea an tiomáint ar meisce
Find out about the law on drink driving, including random breath testing, powers of the Gardai and procedures if you are arrested
Faigh amach faoin dlí maidir le tiomáint ar meisce, lena n-áirítear an tástáil randamach anála, cumhachtaí an Gharda Síochána agus nósanna imeachta má ghabhtar tú
Penalty points for driving offences
Pointí pionóis i gcomhair cionta tiomána
Penalty points for driving offences were introduced in 2001
Tugadh pointí pionóis i gcomhair cionta tiomána isteach in 2001
How does the penalty points system work?
Conas a oibríonn córas na bpointí pionóis?
Which offences attract penalty points and how long do points remain on your licence?
Cad iad na cionta a dtéann pointí pionóis leo, agus cé chomh fada a fhanann pointí ar do cheadúnas?
Find out about the laws on cycling and the penalties for cycling offences
Aimsigh faisnéis faoi na dlíthe a bhaineann le rothaíocht agus na pionóis a ghearrtar ar chionta rothaíochta
Advice on what to do and what will happen when a vehicle is reported stolen
Tá cur seo sa cháipéis seo ar a tharlaíonn nuair a dhéantar tuairisc go bhfuil gluaisteán goidte

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Taisteal agus Áineas"
Applying for your first Irish passport
Ag déanamh iarratais ar phas Éireannach
Renewing an Irish passport
Pas Éireannach a athnuachan
